name: IndiaUpdates
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
As a part of flash briefing news, get the latest updates from India via NDTV feed. Many more feeds will be added in upcoming versions.

After enabling this skill on your device just say "Alexa, get the flash briefing by India Updates"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
